$block:
Batches are an advanced feature of ShipEngine designed for users who need to generate hundreds or
thousands of labels at a time.

$ul: **batch_errors_url**: A link to a related resource, or an empty object if there is no resource to link to
**href**: The URL of the linked resource, if any
**type**: The type of resource, or the type of relationship to the parent resource
**batch_id**: A string that uniquely identifies the batch
**batch_labels_url**: A link to a related resource, or an empty object if there is no resource to link to
**href**: The URL of the linked resource, if any
**type**: The type of resource, or the type of relationship to the parent resource
**batch_notes**: Custom notes you can add for each created batch (default: )
**batch_number**: The batch number.
**batch_shipments_url**: A link to a related resource, or an empty object if there is no resource to link to
**href**: The URL of the linked resource, if any
**type**: The type of resource, or the type of relationship to the parent resource
**completed**: The number of labels generated in the batch
**count**: The total of errors, warnings, and completed properties
**created_at**: The date and time the batch was created in ShipEngine
**errors**: The number of errors that occurred while generating the batch
**external_batch_id**: A string that uniquely identifies the external batch
**form_download**: A link to a related resource, or an empty object if there is no resource to link to
**href**: The URL of the linked resource, if any
**type**: The type of resource, or the type of relationship to the parent resource
**forms**: The number of forms for customs that are available for download
**label_download**: Reference to the various downloadable file formats for the generated label
**href**: The URL of the linked resource, if any
**pdf**: The URL for the pdf generated label
**png**: The URL for the png generated label
**zpl**: The URL for the zpl generated label
**label_format** (default: pdf)
**label_layout**: label layout (default: 4x6)
**processed_at**: The date and time the batch was processed in ShipEngine
**status**
**warnings**: The number of warnings that occurred while generating the batch
**errors**: The errors associated with the failed API call
**request_id**: A UUID that uniquely identifies the request id.

**request_id**: A UUID that uniquely identifies the request id.
